title: Open Source Monetization: Challenges and Solutions for Sustainability
description: Discover the challenges and strategies for monetizing open-source software. Learn how crowdfunding, sponsorships, corporate contributions, and innovative models ensure the sustainability of open-source projects.
keywords: open source monetization, open source funding, crowdfunding for open source, open-source sustainability, dual licensing, OSaaS, sponsorship platforms, corporate contributions, open source challenges, funding open source projects
